title: Theme Song Move
description:
Pick a theme song and play it for 30 seconds.
Bonus: exaggerate your entrance.

title: Nature Color Hunt
description:
Find 3 colors outside in 5 minutes.
Bonus: make one of them surprising.

title: Two‑Minute Story
description: Tell a 2‑minute story where every sentence starts with “Suddenly…”.

title: Gratitude Text
description: Send one genuine thank‑you text. Keep it short and specific.

title: Trash Grab (Safe)
description: Pick up 5 pieces of litter (safely). Gloves if you’ve got them.

title: Mini Art
description: Draw something tiny. Any paper. Any skill level.

title: Compliment Drop
description:
Give one specific compliment to someone.
No fluff. Just true.

title: Kitchen Remix
description: Invent a new snack combo with whatever’s around.

title: Fresh Air Lap
description:
Step outside for one lap / one minute.
Then come back in.

title: Community Post
description:
Leave one helpful comment in a local group.
Kind + useful.

title: Desk Reset
description:
Clear one small surface for 3 minutes.
Stop early if it’s done.

title: Water + Breathe
description:
Drink water, then take 6 slow breaths.
Yes, that counts.

title: Donation Set‑Aside
description: Set aside one item to donate. Put it by the door.

title: Micro Kindness
description: Do one tiny helpful thing for someone (quietly).

title: Dance Spark
description:
Do a 45‑second dance.
No one is judging. (Except maybe you.)

title: Quick Stretch
description:
Do a 2‑minute stretch.
Pick your tightest spot.

title: Neighborhood Note
description: Write down one thing you love about where you live.

title: Sidewalk Smile
description:
Make eye contact and smile at three people.
Or one. One is fine.

title: Future‑You Gift
description: Do a 3‑minute task your future self will thank you for.

title: Tiny Civic Check
description:
Look up one local issue and save one link.
That’s it.
